knimeNode.name: Substructure Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits your input table based on the fact if the input structure does or does not contain a given substructure.

fullDescription.intro: A filter that splits the compounds from the input table according to if they do or do not contain a given substructure.
fullDescription.option: Column that contains the molecules to be filtered
Substructure that needs to be contained to be accepted by the filter

ports.inPort: Data table containing the molecules to be filtered.
ports.outPort: Data table containing only the molecules that contain the substructure.
Data table containing only the molecules that do not contain the substructure.
